A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's Star Wars\, so it gets half a star before even watching it. Kind of like putting your name on the SAT.  \nThis film was a true disappointment. No respect for previous character development for Luke and Leia. The entire movie was one giant joke. If you go into this movie expecting to see a campy family friendly Disney film about space\, prepare to be amazed! If you wanted to see a new Star Wars film.. sorry. This director has done for the Star Wars franchise what Tim Burton did for the batman franchise.
